name: Nebs 'n Debs
overview:
What's harder than escaping a planet full of dangerous flora and fauna? Doing it all with a crystal-hungry octopus fused to your head!

Nebs 'n Debs is a new game for the original Nintendo Entertainment System. Run, jump and dash your way through 12 levels as you search for the missing parts of Debs' ship to escape the hostile alien planet Vespasian 7MV! Along the way you'll discover powerups left behind by an ancient alien civilization and gather crystals to feed the strange being fused to your head. If you don't gather enough... you'll both perish.

Do you have what it takes to master?
-12 unique levels
-HAAAAARRRRRDDDDDDDDDD Mode (unlocked after beating all 12 levels)
-Run-jump-dashing-platforming-crystal-collecting action.
